column5: Cozy Water View Lodge w/ Pool (3/3.5) Great sunset views of Clear Lake from every window and day views from the back with a deck overlooking the pool. Bring your kayaks, jet ski's or use our 40 ft boat slip. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the coziness, the views, the high ceilings and the kitchen. It's great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), or groups.
